title: Can I use Annie's Q on the tower?
body: I haven't been playing much mid and I am trying {{champion:1}}  right now, I don't know if the Q of Annie's would work or not. {{champion:4}}  W works so if Annie's Q works on tower then please tell me.

replies.body:
Nope :P  

> ACTIVE: Annie hurls a fireball at the target enemy, dealing magic damage.

Towers don't count as units, but rather as structures. They're only targetable by autoattacks, some empowered autoattacks (like Nasus), and Ziggs' Satchel Charge.
You could just make life easier and try it out yourself...
not to be that guy but why didn't you just go in to a custom game and test it out instead of waiting 3 hours for someone to answer the question for you
